message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll really love.  I'm asking for $13,000 for it.  It's a fair price considering its value.  What do you think?
Hi Alice,  $13,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $11,500.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down a bit to $12,500.  This is still a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $12,500 is still a little too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $12,200.  If you're open to that, we can finalize the deal.
